channel.title: Making commands?
channel.description:
Q1. How can i make commands such as ::cwars so i tele cwars and others like ::feedme so they automatically log out like on cheatskape?
Q2. Also how can i make it so admin can spawn anythin they want?
Q3. How can i make npc shop ppl sell different things?
I am using 1337pk source :)
All help appreciated

item.title: Making commands?
item.dc:creator: @witherz witherz
item.description:
@witherz wrote:

				sendQuest("@dre@Admin Help Panel", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to Tottonboyz", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by admin - from cheezscape source - Xerozcheez@dbl@", 8147);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@ ADMIN COMMANDS", 8150);
				sendQuest("@blu@::banuser @red@to ban a player", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@blu@::macrowarn @red@ give the player a macro warning", 8152);
				sendQuest("@blu@::getpass @red@ gets the player pw (abuse = perm ban)", 8153);
				sendQuest("@blu@::clicks @red@ turns mouse logging on/off", 8154);
			        sendQuest("@blu@Muting: @red@ To mute a player for 48 hours select", 8155);
			        sendQuest("@red@ the mute option from report abuse menu when reporting a player.", 8156);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }
	
			}


public void QuestHelpMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Quests", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@The secret commands quest", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@To start tele to 2511,3494...@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Then click board raft for your first instructions :) @dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8152);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8155);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8156);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8157);
					sendQuest("@dbl@*future quest*", 8160);

So where wud i put on there?

item.title: Making commands?
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

dude dont make command’s stop it’s annoying id did it and hade like 40 error’s that stuffed my server up completley if you dont want… people to use commands just telet em

by doing this…
go on client.java

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("partyhouse")) if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); } else if (absY <= 3672) { teleportToX = 2737; teleportToY = 3471; sendMessage("ftw drop party??!!!!"); }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dummies”))
if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminspot”)&& playerRights >= 3){ if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminspot”)){ teleportToX = 2747;
teleportToY = 2785;
sendMessage(“you are at the admin only spot no normall players here”);
sendMessage(“go left for the monster hp!!! level 450”);
}

thats what i got
just delete it…
press cntr and f
and type command ul evetually find ur command

+rep?

item.title: Making commands?
item.dc:creator: @pa1ntb3ller pa1ntb3ller
item.description:
@pa1ntb3ller wrote:

Im not at home atm so this may not be corect on the whole tele thing, but give it a try

  1. you can just edit an old command, lets say you had ::pk as a command to tele you to pk zone, well you copy paste that command right under it, change the name of the command, change the level of people able to use it, i sugges 0 for all, and lastleyy put in the tele coordinates were the others used to be.

  2. hit ctrl f in client.java, search for “pickup” change the level.

3.go into shops and add the id number and ammount to the list of the shop you want it in. =] hope all that helps

Read full topic
